title: Barbara Castle – 1966 Confirmation on Not Reappointing Lord Beeching
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Barbara Castle, the then Transport Minister, in the House of Commons on 2 February 1966.
content:
**Mr. Box** asked the Minister of Transport whether she will approach Lord Beeching with a view to his reappointment as Chairman of British Railways.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals

**Mrs. Castle** No.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
